snippet: The marriage of Kathy Redmond, best known for waging a national campaign against violent athletes, and Derek Brown, a former running back, is part of a triumphant homecoming story.
abstract: Profile of Kathy Redmond, Nebraska-Lincoln graduate who claims to have been sexually assaulted twice in 1991 by the same football player; Redmond filed Title IV suit against the university and her perpetrator Christian Peter, and upon settlement waged a national campaign against violent athletes; Redmond's marriage to former NFL running back Derek Brown, onetime teammate of Peter's, completes Redmond's liberating journey of reconciliation and renewal.
lead_paragraph: The marriage of Kathy Redmond, best known for waging a national campaign against violent athletes, and Derek Brown, a former running back, is part of a triumphant homecoming story.

headline.seo: Kathy Redmond’s Journey of Reconciliation With the University of Nebraska
